public static void close(java.lang.String name = "default")

getSpace

public static Space getSpace(java.lang.String name = "default")
Returns the named TupleSpace. If it doesn't exist, it is created first. If no name is provided, the default space will be returned.
param:
name The name of the TupleSpace
return:
a reference to the named TupleSpace
